```{r setup, include = FALSE}

                      warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE)

library(here)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(RefManageR)
library(tidyverse)

options(knitr.kable.NA = "")

```

```{r}

source(here("style/blake_cv_style.R"))

```

```{r}

bib <- RefManageR::ReadBib(here("data/my_bibliography.bib"))
bib <- cv_table(bib)

```

### Peer-reviewed journal articles

```{r}

bib %>% 
  filter(groups == "article") %>% 
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. _{journaltitle}_ {volume} ({number}): {pages}. DOI: {doi} <br><br>"
    
    )) %>% 
  select(date, ref) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```

### Book reviews

```{r}

bib %>%
  filter(groups == "review") %>%
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. _{journaltitle}_ {volume} ({number}): {pages}. DOI: {doi} <br><br>"

```

### Technical reports

```{r}

bib %>% 
  filter(groups == "report") %>% 
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. {note}. <br><br>"
    
    )) %>% 
  select(date, ref) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```
